author: CTPPS
body:
#### PR description:
SimG4CMS module of PPS full simulation. This is (hopefully) the last PR with code, before the one with the config files which will include the PPS full simulation into the CMS simulation chain

#### PR validation:
The following tests have been run:
scram b runtests
scram b code-checks
scram b code-formats (which triggered some style changes in the files)
runTheMatrix.py --job-reports -j 14 -s -l limited -i all --ibeos
which produced the output:
30 25 11 7 3 0 0 0 0 tests passed, 2 4 14 1 0 0 0 0 0 failed

The tests that failed are listed at /eos/home-m/mundim/SimG4CMS-PPS_failed_tests.txt, all of them with the message:

 Fatal Root Error: @SUB=TSystem::ExpandFileName
input: $HOME/.root.mimes, output: $HOME/.root.mimes

Preceded by an eos file connection error. The tests were attempted during 2 days with similar results.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR:

Before submitting your pull requests, make sure you followed this checklist:
- verify that the PR is really intended for the chosen branch
- verify that changes follow [CMS Naming, Coding, And Style Rules](http://cms-sw.github.io/cms_coding_rules.html)
- verify that the PR passes the basic test procedure suggested in the [CMSSW PR instructions](https://cms-sw.github.io/PRWorkflow.html)
title: SimG4CMS/PPS module for the PPS full simulation
